TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Strings extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用來執行字串作業的程序。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform string operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和操作字串的執行階段程式庫成員。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that manipulate strings. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在其空間將字串分隔。The following example demonstrates how to split a string at its spaces. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示對應至字元的字元碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 任何有效的 或 運算式。

span.span: Any valid or expression.

param.span: 如果 String 為 運算式，則只有字串的第一個字元才會用於輸入。

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示對應至字元的字元碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

returns.span: 傳回 值，表示對應至字元的字元碼。

span.span: Returns an value representing the character code corresponding to a character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Asc` 會傳回*字碼指標*，或輸入字元的字元碼。`Asc` returns the *code point*, or character code, for the input character. 這可以是 0 到 255，單一位元組字元集 (sbcs) 的值介於-32768 到 32767 之間任一雙位元組字集 (DBCS) 的值。This can be 0 through 255 for single-byte character set (SBCS) values and -32768 through 32767 for double-byte character set (DBCS) values. `AscW` 傳回輸入字元的 Unicode 字碼指標。`AscW` returns the Unicode code point for the input character. 這可以是 0 到 65535。This can be 0 through 65535. 傳回的值與目前執行緒的文化特性和程式碼頁面設定無關。The returned value is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread. > [!NOTE] > `AscB`舊版的 Visual Basic 的函式會傳回一個位元組，而不是字元的程式碼。The `AscB` function of earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a code for a byte, rather than a character. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. Visual Basic 2005 的所有字串都會以 Unicode，和`AscB`不受支援。All Visual Basic 2005 strings are in Unicode, and `AscB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Asc`函數來傳回`Integer`字元對應至每個字串中的第一個字母的代碼。The following example uses the `Asc` function to return `Integer` character codes corresponding to the first letter in each string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

.method public static char Chr(int32 CharCode) cil managed
Public Function Chr (CharCode As Integer) As Char
public: static char Chr(int CharCode);
static member Chr : int -> char

param.name: CharCode
param.span: 必要。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 運算式，表示字元的字碼指標或字元碼。

span.span: An expression representing the code point, or character code, for the character.

summary.span: 傳回與指定的字元碼關聯的字元。

span.span: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.

returns.span: 傳回與指定的字元碼關聯的字元。

span.span: Returns the character associated with the specified character code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非對稱式的範圍所接受`CharCode`儲存體之間的差異會補償`Short`而`Integer`。The asymmetric range accepted for `CharCode` compensates for the storage differences between the `Short` and the `Integer`. 比方說，是-29183`Short`但 +36353 `Integer`。For example, -29183 is a `Short` but +36353 is an `Integer`. 這也能與 Visual Basic 6.0 的相容性。This also facilitates compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0. `Chr` 會使用類別中命名空間，以判斷目前的執行緒是否使用單一位元組字元集 (SBCS) 或雙位元組字集 (DBCS)。`Chr` uses the class in the namespace to determine if the current thread is using a single-byte character set (SBCS) or a double-byte character set (DBCS). 然後`CharCode`為程式碼指向適當的集合。It then takes `CharCode` as a code point in the appropriate set. 此範圍可以是 0 到 255 的 SBCS 字元-32768 到 65535 DBCS 字元。The range can be 0 through 255 for SBCS characters and -32768 through 65535 for DBCS characters. 傳回的值取決於目前的執行緒中包含的字碼頁的屬性類別中命名空間。The returned value depends on the code page for the current thread, which is contained in the property of the class in the namespace. 您可以取得藉由指定`System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`。You can obtain by specifying `System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.TextInfo.ANSICodePage`. `ChrW` 採用`CharCode`做為 Unicode 字碼指標。`ChrW` takes `CharCode` as a Unicode code point. 範圍是目前執行緒的文化特性和字碼頁設定獨立的。The range is independent of the culture and code page settings for the current thread. 範圍為-32768 到-1 的值會視為相同 32768 到 + 65535 的範圍中的值。Values from -32768 through -1 are treated the same as values in the range +32768 through +65535. 從 0 到 31 的數字是標準非可列印的 ASCII 碼相同。Numbers from 0 through 31 are the same as standard nonprintable ASCII codes. 比方說，`Chr(10)`傳回換行字元。For example, `Chr(10)` returns a line feed character. > [!NOTE] > `ChrB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回單一位元組。The `ChrB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns a single byte. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. Visual Basic 和.NET Framework 中的所有字串都會以 Unicode，和`ChrB`不受支援。All strings in Visual Basic and the .NET Framework are in Unicode, and `ChrB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Chr`函式，傳回與指定的字元碼相關聯的字元。The following example uses the `Chr` function to return the character associated with the specified character code. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有相符的`Match`內找到`Source`，則`Filter`函式會傳回空陣列。If no matches of `Match` are found within `Source`, the `Filter` function returns an empty array. 如果發生錯誤`Source`設為`Nothing`或不是一維陣列。An error occurs if `Source` is set to `Nothing` or is not a one-dimensional array. 所傳回的陣列`Filter`函式僅包含足夠項目包含相符的項目數目。The array returned by the `Filter` function contains only enough elements to contain the number of matched items. `Compare`引數可以是下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |常數Constant|描述Description| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|執行二進位比較Performs a binary comparison| |`CompareMethod.Text`|執行文字比較Performs a textual comparison| ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用`Filter`函式。This example demonstrates the use of the `Filter` function. ## Remarks 方法也會提供類似的功能。The method also provides similar functionality. 如果您要格式化的未當地語系化的數字字串，您應該使用使用者定義數值格式，以確保您取得想要的外觀。If you are formatting a nonlocalized numeric string, you should use a user-defined numeric format to ensure that you get the look you want. 如果您嘗試將數字格式而不指定`Style`，則`Format`函式會提供類似的功能`Str`函式，雖然它是國際感知。If you try to format a number without specifying `Style`, the `Format` function provides functionality similar to the `Str` function, although it is internationally aware. 不過，正值的數字格式化成使用的字串`Format`函式不包含前置空格保留正負號的值; 這些轉換使用`Str`函式會保留前置空格。However, positive numbers formatted as strings using the `Format` function don't include a leading space reserved for the sign of the value; those converted using the `Str` function retain the leading space. ## 不同的格式，為不同的數值的Different Formats for Different Numeric Values 數字的使用者定義的格式運算式可以有一至三個以分號分隔的區段。A user-defined format expression for numbers can have from one to three sections separated by semicolons. 如果`Style`引數`Format`函式包含其中一個預先定義數值格式，則允許只有一個區段。If the `Style` argument of the `Format` function contains one of the predefined numeric formats, only one section is allowed. |如果您使用If you use|這是結果This is the result| |-|-| |只有一個區段One section only|格式運算式套用至所有值。The format expression applies to all values.| |兩個區段Two sections|第一個區段套用至正值和零;第二個適用於負數值。The first section applies to positive values and zeros; the second applies to negative values.| |三個區段Three sections|第一個區段套用至正值、 負值，適用於第二個和第三個適用於零值。The first section applies to positive values, the second applies to negative values, and the third applies to zeros.| 下列範例有兩個區段： 第一個定義正值和零; 值的格式第二個區段定義負值的格式。The following example has two sections: the first defines the format for positive values and zeros; the second section defines the format for negative values. 由於`Style`引數`Format`函式會接受字串，它用引號括住。Since the `Style` argument of the `Format` function takes a string, it is enclosed by quotation marks. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#18)] 如果您幾個分號而它們之間沒有任何東西，遺漏的區段會列印使用正值的格式。If you include semicolons with nothing between them, the missing section is printed using the format of the positive value. 比方說，下列格式顯示正值和負值值 使用第一個區段中的格式，並且顯示`Zero`如果值為零。For example, the following format displays positive and negative values using the format in the first section and displays `Zero` if the value is zero. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#19)] ## 預先定義數值格式Predefined Numeric Formats 下表會識別預先定義數值格式名稱。The following table identifies the predefined numeric format names. 這些可能會使用名稱做為`Style`引數`Format`函式：These may be used by name as the `Style` argument for the `Format` function: |格式名稱Format name|描述Description| |-|-| |`General Number`、 `G`或 `g``General Number`, `G`, or `g`|顯示數字，且沒有千位分隔符號。Displays number with no thousand separator.

例如，`Format(&H3FA, "g")`傳回`1018`。For example, `Format(&H3FA, "g")` returns `1018`.| |`Currency`、 `C`或 `c``Currency`, `C`, or `c`|使用千分位分隔符號，會顯示數字，如果適當;在小數點分隔符號的右邊顯示兩位數。Displays number with thousand separator, if appropriate; displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator. 輸出根據系統地區設定。Output is based on system locale settings.

例如，`Format(1234567, "c")`傳回`$1,234,567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "c")` returns `$1,234,567.00`.| |`Fixed`、 `F`或 `f``Fixed`, `F`, or `f`|在小數點分隔符號的右邊，會顯示至少一個數字向左和兩位數。Displays at least one digit to the left and two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(1234567, "f")`傳回`1234567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "f")` returns `1234567.00`.| |`Standard`、 `N`或 `n``Standard`, `N`, or `n`|在小數點分隔符號的右邊顯示千位分隔符號，左邊的至少一個數字與兩位數的數字。Displays number with thousand separator, at least one digit to the left and two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(1234567, "n")`傳回`1,234,567.00`。For example, `Format(1234567, "n")` returns `1,234,567.00`.| |`Percent`|顯示乘以 100 百分比符號 （%），立即在右邊加上; 在小數點分隔符號的右邊永遠顯示兩位數。Displays number multiplied by 100 with a percent sign (%) appended immediately to the right; always displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(0.4744, "Percent")`傳回`47.44%`。For example, `Format(0.4744, "Percent")` returns `47.44%`.| |`P`或 `p``P`, or `p`|會顯示含有千位分隔符號，乘以 100 百分比符號 （%），用單一空格來附加至正確的和分隔的數字; 在小數點分隔符號的右邊永遠顯示兩位數。Displays number with thousandths separator multiplied by 100 with a percent sign (%) appended to the right and separated by a single space; always displays two digits to the right of the decimal separator.

例如，`Format(0.80345, "p")`傳回`80.35 %`。For example, `Format(0.80345, "p")` returns `80.35 %`.| |`Scientific`|使用標準科學記號標記法，提供兩個有效位數。Uses standard scientific notation, providing two significant digits.

例如，`Format(1234567, "Scientific")`傳回`1.23E+06`。For example, `Format(1234567, "Scientific")` returns `1.23E+06`.| |`E`或 `e``E`, or `e`|使用標準科學記號標記法，提供六個有效位數。Uses standard scientific notation, providing six significant digits.

例如，`Format(1234567, "e")`傳回`1.234567e+006`。For example, `Format(1234567, "e")` returns `1.234567e+006`.| |`D`或 `d``D`, or `d`|包含值的十進位 (基底 10) 格式的數字的字串顯示數字。Displays number as a string that contains the value of the number in Decimal (base 10) format. 整數類資料類型支援此選項 (`Byte`， `Short`， `Integer`， `Long`) 只。This option is supported for integral types (`Byte`, `Short`, `Integer`, `Long`) only.

例如，`Format(&H7F, "d")`傳回`127`。For example, `Format(&H7F, "d")` returns `127`.| |`X`或 `x``X`, or `x`|包含值的十六進位 (基底 16) 格式的數字的字串顯示數字。Displays number as a string that contains the value of the number in Hexadecimal (base 16) format. 整數類資料類型支援此選項 (`Byte`， `Short`， `Integer`， `Long`) 只。This option is supported for integral types (`Byte`, `Short`, `Integer`, `Long`) only.

例如，`Format(127, "x")`傳回`7f`。For example, `Format(127, "x")` returns `7f`.| |`Yes/No`|會顯示`No`數字為 0，否則為，如果會顯示`Yes`。Displays `No` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `Yes`.

例如，`Format(0, "Yes/No")`傳回`No`。For example, `Format(0, "Yes/No")` returns `No`.| |`True/False`|會顯示`False`數字為 0，否則為，如果會顯示`True`。Displays `False` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `True`.

例如，`Format(1, "True/False")`傳回`True`。For example, `Format(1, "True/False")` returns `True`.| |`On/Off`|會顯示`Off`數字為 0，否則為，如果會顯示`On`。Displays `Off` if number is 0; otherwise, displays `On`.

例如，`Format(1, "On/Off")`傳回`On`。For example, `Format(1, "On/Off")` returns `On`.| ### 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Yes/No`， `True/False`，和`On/Off`不支援格式。The `Yes/No`, `True/False`, and `On/Off` formats are not supported. ## 使用者定義數值格式User-Defined Numeric Formats 下表列出可用來建立使用者定義的數字格式的字元。The following table identifies characters you can use to create user-defined number formats. 這些可能用來建置`Style`引數`Format`函式：These may be used to build the `Style` argument for the `Format` function: |字元Character|描述Description| |-|-| |無None|顯示沒有格式的數字。Displays the number with no formatting.| |(`0`)(`0`)|數字預留位置。Digit placeholder. 顯示數字或零。Displays a digit or a zero. 如果運算式在格式字串中零出現的位置有一個數字，則會顯示;否則，會顯示在該位置為零。If the expression has a digit in the position where the zero appears in the format string, display it; otherwise, displays a zero in that position.

如果此數字較少的字位數比會是零 （在的小數點任何一邊） 格式的運算式，會顯示前置或尾端零。If the number has fewer digits than there are zeros (on either side of the decimal) in the format expression, displays leading or trailing zeros. 如果此數字位數比在小數點分隔符號的右邊，有格式運算式小數點右邊的零四捨五入數量一樣多的小數位數為零。If the number has more digits to the right of the decimal separator than there are zeros to the right of the decimal separator in the format expression, rounds the number to as many decimal places as there are zeros. 如果此數字位數比在小數點分隔符號的左邊有格式運算式小數點左邊零顯示未經修改的額外位數。If the number has more digits to the left of the decimal separator than there are zeros to the left of the decimal separator in the format expression, displays the extra digits without modification.| |(`#`)(`#`)|數字預留位置。Digit placeholder. 顯示數字或零。Displays a digit or nothing. 如果運算式的位置有數字其中`#`字元會出現在格式字串，它會顯示; 否則會執行任何動作顯示在該位置。If the expression has a digit in the position where the `#` character appears in the format string, displays it; otherwise, displays nothing in that position.

這個符號的運作方式類似`0`數字預留位置，但前置和尾端零不會顯示如果此數字的位數，比有`#`格式運算式在小數點分隔符號的任一邊的字元。This symbol works like the `0` digit placeholder, except that leading and trailing zeros aren't displayed if the number has fewer digits than there are `#` characters on either side of the decimal separator in the format expression.| |(`.`)(`.`)|小數預留位置。Decimal placeholder. 小數預留位置可決定小數點左側和右側顯示多少位數。The decimal placeholder determines how many digits are displayed to the left and right of the decimal separator. 如果格式運算式僅包含`#`這個符號左邊的字元; 小於 1 開頭的小數點的數字。If the format expression contains only `#` characters to the left of this symbol; numbers smaller than 1 begin with a decimal separator. 若要顯示前置零，小數的數字，使用零做為小數點分隔符號的左邊，第一個數字預留位置。To display a leading zero displayed with fractional numbers, use zero as the first digit placeholder to the left of the decimal separator. 在某些地區設定中，使用逗號作為小數分隔符號。In some locales, a comma is used as the decimal separator. 做為小數預留位置，在格式化輸出中實際的字元取決於您的系統可辨識的數字格式。The actual character used as a decimal placeholder in the formatted output depends on the number format recognized by your system. 因此，您應該使用句號做為小數預留位置格式中即使您是使用逗號做為小數預留位置的地區設定中。Thus, you should use the period as the decimal placeholder in your formats even if you are in a locale that uses a comma as a decimal placeholder. 格式化的字串會出現在正確的地區設定格式。The formatted string will appear in the format correct for the locale.| |(`%`)(`%`)|百分比預留位置。Percent placeholder. 將運算式乘以 100。Multiplies the expression by 100. 百分比字元 (`%`) 會插入格式字串中出現的位置。The percent character (`%`) is inserted in the position where it appears in the format string.| |(`,`)(`,`)|千位分隔符號。Thousand separator. 千位分隔符號隔開百四個以上的地方，可以在小數點分隔符號的左邊的數字。The thousand separator separates thousands from hundreds within a number that has four or more places to the left of the decimal separator. 在指定千位分隔符號的標準用法如果格式中包含的千位分隔符號括住數字預留位置 (`0`或`#`)。Standard use of the thousand separator is specified if the format contains a thousand separator surrounded by digit placeholders (`0` or `#`).

千位分隔符號左邊或最右邊的小數分隔符號 （指定小數） 表示字串中字元 「 延展數字除以 1000，來進位，視。 」A thousand separator immediately to the left of the decimal separator (whether or not a decimal is specified) or as the rightmost character in the string means "scale the number by dividing it by 1,000, rounding as needed." 為顯示數字小於 1,000 但大於或等於 500 `1`，和數字小於 500 顯示為`0`。Numbers smaller than 1,000 but greater or equal to 500 are displayed as `1`, and numbers smaller than 500 are displayed as `0`. 在這個位置中的兩個相鄰千位分隔符號的 1 百萬個和另一個因素為 1,000 個每個額外的分隔符號來調整。Two adjacent thousand separators in this position scale by a factor of 1 million, and an additional factor of 1,000 for each additional separator.

以外任何位置，在小數點分隔符號的左邊或右邊的位置，在字串中的多個分隔符號都會直接視為指定要使用千位分隔符號。Multiple separators in any position other than immediately to the left of the decimal separator or the rightmost position in the string are treated simply as specifying the use of a thousand separator. 在某些地區設定，用句點做為千位分隔符號。In some locales, a period is used as a thousand separator. 做為千位分隔符號，在格式化輸出中實際的字元取決於您的系統可辨識的數字格式。The actual character used as the thousand separator in the formatted output depends on the Number Format recognized by your system. 因此，您應該使用逗號做為千位分隔符號格式中即使您是使用句點作為千位分隔符號的地區設定。Thus, you should use the comma as the thousand separator in your formats even if you are in a locale that uses a period as a thousand separator. 格式化的字串會出現在正確的地區設定格式。The formatted string will appear in the format correct for the locale.

例如，請考慮下列的三個格式字串：For example, consider the three following format strings:

- `"#,0."`將數值 100 萬個格式化為字串"100,000,000"哪些使用千位分隔符號。- `"#,0."`, which uses the thousands separator to format the number 100 million as the string "100,000,000".
- `"#0,."`是使用一千倍來格式化數字 100 萬個做為字串"100000"。- `"#0,."`, which uses scaling by a factor of one thousand to format the number 100 million as the string "100000".
- `"#,0,."`哪些使用千位分隔符號和以一千做為字串"100,000"格式化數字 100 萬。- `"#,0,."`, which uses the thousands separator and scaling by one thousand to format the number 100 million as the string "100,000".| |(`:`)(`:`)|時間分隔符號。Time separator. 在某些地區設定中，您可能使用其他字元來代表時間分隔符號。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the time separator. 時間分隔符號區隔小時、 分鐘和秒數會在格式化時間值時。The time separator separates hours, minutes, and seconds when time values are formatted. 實際使用做為時間分隔符號，在格式化輸出中的字元取決於您的系統設定。The actual character used as the time separator in formatted output is determined by your system settings.| |(`/`)(`/`)|日期分隔符號。Date separator. 在某些地區設定中，您可能使用其他字元來代表日期分隔符號。In some locales, other characters may be used to represent the date separator. 日期分隔符號區隔會在格式化日期值時日、 月和年。The date separator separates the day, month, and year when date values are formatted. 實際格式化輸出中的日期分隔符號使用的字元取決於您的系統設定。The actual character used as the date separator in formatted output is determined by your system settings.| |(`E-``E+``e-``e+`)(`E-``E+``e-``e+`)|科學格式。Scientific format. 如果格式運算式包含至少一個數字預留位置 (`0`或`#`) 的左邊`E-`， `E+`， `e-`，或`e+`，號碼會顯示在科學格式和`E`或`e`數目及其指數之間插入。If the format expression contains at least one digit placeholder (`0` or `#`) to the left of `E-`, `E+`, `e-`, or `e+`, the number is displayed in scientific format and `E` or `e` is inserted between the number and its exponent. 左邊的數字預留位置的數目會決定指數中的數字數目。The number of digit placeholders to the left determines the number of digits in the exponent. 使用`E-`或`e-`放置負指數旁邊的減號。Use `E-` or `e-` to place a minus sign next to negative exponents. 使用`E+`或`e+`放置負指數旁邊的減號和正指數旁邊的加號。Use `E+` or `e+` to place a minus sign next to negative exponents and a plus sign next to positive exponents. 您也必須包含這個符號右邊，以取得正確的格式的數字預留位置。You must also include digit placeholders to the right of this symbol to get correct formatting.| |`-` `+` `$` ( )`-` `+` `$` ( )|常值字元。Literal characters. 這些字元會完全按照輸入格式字串中顯示。These characters are displayed exactly as typed in the format string. 若要顯示未在所列其中一項，前面加上反斜線 (`\`) 或將它括在雙引號 ("")。To display a character other than one of those listed, precede it with a backslash (`\`) or enclose it in double quotation marks (" ").| |(`\`)(`\`)|顯示格式字串中的下一個字元。Displays the next character in the format string. 若要顯示的字元有特殊義意的常值字元，前面加上反斜線 (`\`)。To display a character that has special meaning as a literal character, precede it with a backslash (`\`). 反斜線本身不會顯示。The backslash itself isn't displayed. 使用反斜線就是以雙引號括住的下一個字元。Using a backslash is the same as enclosing the next character in double quotation marks. 若要顯示一個反斜線，請使用兩個反斜線 (`\\`)。To display a backslash, use two backslashes (`\\`).

範例的常值的字元都格式化的日期和時間格式字元無法顯示的字元 (`a`， `c`， `d`， `h`， `m`， `n`， `p`， `q`， `s`， `t`， `w`， `y`， `/`，以及`:`)，數值格式字元 (`#`， `0`， `%`， `E`， `e`，逗號和句號)，並將字串格式字元 (`@`， `&`， `<`， `>`，和`!`)。Examples of characters that can't be displayed as literal characters are the date-formatting and time-formatting characters (`a`, `c`, `d`, `h`, `m`, `n`, `p`, `q`, `s`, `t`, `w`, `y`, `/`, and `:`), the numeric-formatting characters (`#`, `0`, `%`, `E`, `e`, comma, and period), and the string-formatting characters (`@`, `&`, `<`, `>`, and `!`).| |(`"``ABC``"`)(`"``ABC``"`)|顯示雙引號內的字串 ("")。Displays the string inside the double quotation marks (" "). 若要從程式碼中的樣式引數中包含字串，您必須使用`Chr(34)`括住的文字 (`34`是引號 （"） 的字元程式碼)。To include a string in the style argument from within code, you must use `Chr(34)` to enclose the text (`34` is the character code for a quotation mark (")).| ### 舊版程式碼範例Legacy Code Example 下表包含數字的範例格式的運算式。The following table contains some sample format expressions for numbers. （這些範例全都會假設您的系統地區設定是英文-美國）第一個資料行包含格式字串`Style`引數`Format`函式; `d`字元會顯示在使用者定義的日期格式的日期。The `d` character displays the day in a user-defined date format.| |`Long Time`、 `Medium Time`或 `T``Long Time`, `Medium Time`, or `T`|使用目前文化特性的完整時間格式; 來顯示時間通常包含時、 分和秒。Displays a time using your current culture's long time format; typically includes hours, minutes, seconds. 例如，`11:07:31 AM`。For example, `11:07:31 AM`.| |`Short Time` 或 `t``Short Time` or `t`|顯示使用目前文化特性的簡短時間格式的時間。Displays a time using your current culture's short time format. 例如，`11:07 AM`。For example, `11:07 AM`.

`t`字元會顯示`AM`或`PM`以使用者定義的時間格式使用 12 小時制的地區設定的值。The `t` character displays `AM` or `PM` values for locales that use a 12-hour clock in a user-defined time format.| |`f`|顯示完整日期和簡短時間，根據目前文化特性的格式。Displays the long date and short time according to your current culture's format. 例如，`Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07 AM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07 AM`.| |`F`|顯示完整日期和長的時間，根據目前文化特性的格式。Displays the long date and long time according to your current culture's format. 例如，`Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07:31 AM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 11:07:31 AM`.| |`g`|顯示簡短日期和簡短時間，根據目前文化特性的格式。Displays the short date and short time according to your current culture's format. 例如，`3/12/2008 11:07 AM`。For example, `3/12/2008 11:07 AM`.| |`M`, `m``M`, `m`|顯示的月份和日期的日。Displays the month and the day of a date. 例如，`March 12`。For example, `March 12`.

`M`字元會以使用者定義的日期格式顯示月份。The `M` character displays the month in a user-defined date format. `m`字元會以使用者定義的時間格式顯示分鐘。The `m` character displays the minutes in a user-defined time format.| |`R`, `r``R`, `r`|根據日期格式化屬性。Formats the date according to the property. 例如，`Wed, 12 Mar 2008 11:07:31 GMT`。For example, `Wed, 12 Mar 2008 11:07:31 GMT`. 格式化的日期不需要調整日期和時間值。The formatted date does not adjust the value of the date and time. 您必須調整為 GMT 日期/時間值，然後再呼叫`Format`函式。You must adjust the Date/Time value to GMT before calling the `Format` function.| |`s`|格式化的日期和時間做為可排序的索引。Formats the date and time as a sortable index. 例如，`2008-03-12T11:07:31`。For example, `2008-03-12T11:07:31`.

`s`字元會以使用者定義的時間格式顯示秒。The `s` character displays the seconds in a user-defined time format.| |`u`|日期及時間格式化為 GMT 可排序的索引。Formats the date and time as a GMT sortable index. 例如，`2008-03-12 11:07:31Z`。For example, `2008-03-12 11:07:31Z`.| |`U`|格式化日期和時間很長的日期和長的時間為 GMT。Formats the date and time with the long date and long time as GMT. 例如，`Wednesday, March 12, 2008 6:07:31 PM`。For example, `Wednesday, March 12, 2008 6:07:31 PM`.| |`Y`, `y``Y`, `y`|將日期格式化為年份和月份。Formats the date as the year and month. 例如，`March, 2008`。For example, `March, 2008`.

`Y`和`y`字元以使用者定義的日期格式顯示年份。The `Y` and `y` characters display the year in a user-defined date format.| 如需應用程式的目前文化特性資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 時間分隔符號區隔小時、 分鐘和秒數會在格式化時間值時。The time separator separates hours, minutes, and seconds when time values are formatted. 使用做為時間分隔符號，在格式化輸出中實際的字元取決於您的應用程式目前的文化特性值。The actual character that is used as the character that is used as the date separator in formatted output is determined by your application's current culture.| |(`%`)(`%`)|用來表示接下來的字元應該會顯示單一字母格式，而不考慮任何結尾的字母。Used to indicate that the following character should be read as a single-letter format without regard to any trailing letters. 也用來指示將單一字母格式讀取做為使用者定義的格式。Also used to indicate that a single-letter format is read as a user-defined format. 請參閱以下的其他詳細資料。See what follows for additional details.| |`d`|將日期顯示為沒有前置零的數字 (例如`1`)。Displays the day as a number without a leading zero (for example, `1`). 使用`%d`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%d` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`dd`|將日期顯示為有前置零的數字 (例如`01`)。Displays the day as a number with a leading zero (for example, `01`).| |`ddd`|將日期顯示為縮寫 (例如`Sun`)。Displays the day as an abbreviation (for example, `Sun`).| |`dddd`|將日期顯示為完整名稱 (例如`Sunday`)。Displays the day as a full name (for example, `Sunday`).| |`M`|將月份顯示為沒有前置零的數字 (例如，以表示一月`1`)。Displays the month as a number without a leading zero (for example, January is represented as `1`). 使用`%M`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%M` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`MM`|將月份顯示為有前置零的數字 (例如`01/12/01`)。Displays the month as a number with a leading zero (for example, `01/12/01`).| |`MMM`|將月份顯示為縮寫 (例如`Jan`)。Displays the month as an abbreviation (for example, `Jan`).| |`m`|表示為數字顯示分鐘，沒有前置零 (比方說， `12:1:15`)。Displays the minute as a number without leading zeros (for example, `12:1:15`). 使用`%m`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%m` if this is the only character in your `12:15:05`)。Displays the second as a number with leading zeros (for example, `12:15:05`).| |`f`|顯示秒的小數。Displays fractions of seconds. 比方說`ff`會顯示百分之一秒，而則`ffff`顯示萬分之一秒。For example `ff` displays hundredths of seconds, whereas `ffff` displays ten-thousandths of seconds. 您可以使用最多七個`f`使用者定義格式中的符號。You may use up to seven `f` symbols in your user-defined format. 使用`%f`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%f` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`t`|使用 12 小時制，並顯示大寫`A`正午之前的任何小時顯示大寫`P`介於正午與 11:59 P.M 之間的任何小時Uses the 12-hour clock and displays an uppercase `A` for any hour before noon; displays an uppercase `P` for any hour between noon and 11:59 P.M. 使用`%t`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%t` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`tt`|針對使用 12 小時制的地區設定，顯示大寫`AM`正午之前顯示大寫`PM`介於正午與 11:59 P.M 之間的任何小時使用For locales that use a 12-hour clock, displays an uppercase `AM` with any hour before noon; displays an uppercase `PM` with any hour between noon and 11:59 P.M.

針對使用 24 小時制的地區設定，則不顯示。For locales that use a 24-hour clock, displays nothing.| |`y`|顯示沒有前置零的年份數字 (0-9)。Displays the year number (0-9) without leading zeros. 使用`%y`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%y` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`yy`|如果適用的話，請以有前置零，兩位數數值格式顯示年份。Displays the year in two-digit numeric format with a leading zero, if applicable.| |`yyy`|將年份顯示四位數的數值格式中。Displays the year in four-digit numeric format.| |`yyyy`|將年份顯示四位數的數值格式中。Displays the year in four-digit numeric format.| |`z`|以無前置零的時區時差顯示為 (比方說， `-8`)。Displays the timezone offset without a leading zero (for example, `-8`). 使用`%z`如果這是使用者定義數值格式中唯一的字元。Use `%z` if this is the only character in your user-defined numeric format.| |`zz`|顯示以有前置零的時區時差 (例如`-08`)Displays the timezone offset with a leading zero (for example, `-08`)| |`zzz`|顯示完整的時區時差 (例如`-08:00`)Displays the full timezone offset (for example, `-08:00`)| ### 舊版程式碼範例Legacy Code Example 以下是使用者定義的日期和時間格式的範例`December 7, 1958, 8:50 PM, 35 seconds`:The following are examples of user-defined date and time formats for `December 7, 1958, 8:50 PM, 35 seconds`: |格式Format|顯示Displays| |-|-| |`M/d/yy`|`12/7/58`| |`d-MMM`|`7-Dec`| |`d-MMMM-yy`|`7-December-58`| |`d MMMM`|`7 December`| |`MMMM yy`|`December 58`| |`hh:mm tt`|`08:50 PM`| |`h:mm:ss t`|`8:50:35 P`| |`H:mm`|`20:50`| |`H:mm:ss`|`20:50:35`| |`M/d/yyyy H:mm`|`12/7/1958 20:50`| ### 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes 裝置的最小時間解析是由裝置製造商決定。The minimum time resolution for a device is determined by the manufacturer of the device. 如果裝置的時間解析會粗略，`f`格式字元會傳回 0，當該裝置上執行。If the time resolution for the device is coarse enough, the `f` format character returns 0 when run on that device. ## Examples 此範例將示範 `Format` 函式的各種使用方式，以透過 `String` 格式及使用者定義的格式，將值格式化。This example shows various uses of the `Format` function to format values using both `String` formats and user-defined formats. 對於日期分隔符號 (`/`)、時間分隔符號 (`:`) 和 AM/PM 指示器 (`t` 和 `tt`) 而言，系統顯示的實際格式化輸出需視程式碼使用的地區設定而定。For the date separator (`/`), time separator (`:`), and the AM/PM indicators (`t` and `tt`), the actual formatted output displayed by your system depends on the locale settings the code is using. 當時間和日期顯示在開發環境內時，會使用程式碼地區設定的簡短時間格式和簡短日期格式。When times and dates are displayed in the development environment, the short time format and short date format of the code locale are used. > [!NOTE] > 若為使用 24 小時制的地區設定，AM/PM 指示器 (`t` 和 `tt`) 不會顯示任何內容。For locales that use a 24-hour clock, the AM/PM indicators (`t` and `tt`) display nothing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當省略選擇性的一或多個引數時，會改用的電腦相符的地區設定值。When one or more optional arguments are omitted, the computer's matching regional-settings values are used instead. 相對於貨幣值的貨幣符號的位置取決於系統的地區設定。The position of the currency symbol relative to the currency value is determined by the system's regional settings. > [!NOTE] > 所有的設定資訊是來自應用程式的地區設定。All settings information comes from the locale of the application. 根據預設，這會是在控制台中設定的地區設定。By default, that will be the locale set in the control panel. 不過，它可能會變更以程式設計方式使用.NET Framework 中，但前置零，則來自`Number` 索引標籤。However, it may be changed programmatically by using the .NET Framework, except leading zero, which comes from the `Number` tab. `IncludeLeadingDigit`， `UseParensForNegativeNumbers`，和`GroupDigits`引數採用下列 Tri-state 列舉值。The `IncludeLeadingDigit`, `UseParensForNegativeNumbers`, and `GroupDigits` arguments take the following TriState enumeration values. |值Value|描述Description| |-|-| |`TriState.True`|TrueTrue| |`TriState.False`|FalseFalse| |`TriState.UseDefault`|電腦的地區設定The computer's regional settings| ## Examples 下面範例說明如何使用 `FormatCurrency` 函式：The following example illustrates the use of the `FormatCurrency` function. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Date`資料型別一定會包含日期和時間資訊。The `Date` data type always contains both date and time information. 基於型別轉換的詳細資訊，Visual Basic 會考慮 1/1/1 (1 年的 1 年) 是中性的值必須是中性的值時間的日期和 00:00:00 （午夜）。For purposes of type conversion, Visual Basic considers 1/1/1 (January 1 of the year 1) to be a neutral value for the date, and 00:00:00 (midnight) to be a neutral value for the time. 如果您格式化`Date`值為日期/時間字串，`FormatDateTime`不產生的字串中包含中性的值。If you format a `Date` value as a date/time string, `FormatDateTime` does not include neutral values in the resulting string. 例如，如果您將轉換 #1/1/0001 9:30:00 # 字串時，結果會是 「 上午 9:30:00";已隱藏的日期資訊。For example, if you convert #1/1/0001 9:30:00# to a string, the result is "9:30:00 AM"; the date information is suppressed. 不過，日期資訊是仍會出現在原始`Date`值，而且可以使用函式這類復原`DatePart`。However, the date information is still present in the original `Date` value and can be recovered with functions such as `DatePart`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您傳遞`Expression`做為引數`String`常值`FormatDateTime`解譯它根據設定您的應用程式。If you pass the `Expression` argument as a `String` literal, `FormatDateTime` interprets it according to the setting of your application. 不過，如果您將它傳遞為`Date`常值中，使用格式 #mm/dd/yyyy # 中，因為`FormatDateTime`一律會解譯`Date`根據英文 （美國） 文化特性的常值。However, if you pass it as a `Date` literal, use the format #mm/dd/yyyy#, because `FormatDateTime` always interprets a `Date` literal according to the English (US) culture. 這是必要的因為如果應用程式開發，並使用自動程式化`Date`常值從一個文化特性，但有不同的文化特性，平台上執行`Date`常值可能不正確剖析。This is necessary because, if an application is developed and coded using `Date` literals from one culture, but is then executed on a platform with a different culture, the `Date` literals could be parsed incorrectly. `NamedFormat`引數具有下列設定。The `NamedFormat` argument has the following settings. |常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`DateFormat.GeneralDate`|顯示日期和/或時間。Display a date and/or time. 顯示為簡短日期的日期部分。Display a date part as a short date. 如果沒有時間部分，則會顯示為長的時間。If there is a time part, display it as a long time. 如果有的話，便會顯示這兩個部分。If present, both parts display.| |`DateFormat.LongDate`|顯示使用電腦的地區設定中指定的長日期格式的日期。Display a date using the long date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortDate`|顯示使用電腦的地區設定中指定的簡短日期格式的日期。Display a date using the short date format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.LongTime`|顯示使用電腦的地區設定中指定的時間格式的時間。Display a time using the time format specified in your computer's regional settings.| |`DateFormat.ShortTime`|顯示使用 24 小時制格式 (hh: mm) 的時間。Display a time using the 24-hour format (hh:mm).| ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用`FormatDateTime`函式。This example demonstrates the use of the `FormatDateTime` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 沒有之間的同位`Join`和`Split`函式。There is a parity between the `Join` and `Split` functions. `Join`函式接受字串陣列，並結合使用分隔符號字串，以傳回單一字串。The `Join` function takes an array of strings and joins them using a delimiter string, to return a single string. `Split`函式會使用字串，並分隔在分隔符號，以傳回字串陣列。The `Split` function takes a string and separates it at the delimiter, to return an array of strings. 不過，主要差異在於`Join`可以串連字串，使用任何分隔符號的字串、`Split`只可以分開使用單一字元分隔符號的字串。However, a key difference is that `Join` can concatenate strings with any delimiter string, `Split` can only separate strings using a single character delimiter. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`Join`函式來建立數個字串的清單。The following example demonstrates how to use the `Join` function to create a list from several strings. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅有大寫的字母會轉換為小寫;所有小寫字母和 nonletter 字元都保持不變。Only uppercase letters are converted to lowercase; all lowercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged. 管理字串，使大小寫變更所適用的地區設定中使用應用程式時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則作業應該使用方法，然後傳遞或是如`comparisonType`引數。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## Examples 這個範例會使用`LCase`函式來傳回字串的小寫版本。This example uses the `LCase` function to return a lowercase version of a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷中的字元數目`str`，使用`Len`函式。To determine the number of characters in `str`, use the `Len` function. 如果使用中的 Windows Forms 應用程式中或任何其他類別具有`Left`屬性，您必須完整限定函式搭配`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`。If used in a Windows Forms application, or any other class that has a `Left` property, you must fully qualify the function with `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Left`. > [!NOTE] > `LeftB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回字串位元組，而不是字元。The `LeftB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串為 Unicode，和`LeftB`不受支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LeftB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用`Left`函數來傳回子字串的指定`String`。This example demonstrates the use of the `Left` function to return a substring of a given `String`. 在具有的類別`Left`屬性，它可能需要完整限定`Left`函式。In a class that has a `Left` property, it may be necessary to fully qualify the `Left` function. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中表示的字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的物件至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式會使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，決定的大小時`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際的可變長度的字串，用於使用者定義資料類型搭配使用時所需的儲存體位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回的位元組數目的字串，而不是字元。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串為 Unicode，和`LenB`不受支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`變數做為參數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數為 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`不含任何其他類型，會擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中表示的字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的物件至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式會使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，決定的大小時`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際的可變長度的字串，用於使用者定義資料類型搭配使用時所需的儲存體位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回的位元組數目的字串，而不是字元。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串為 Unicode，和`LenB`不受支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`變數做為參數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數為 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`不含任何其他類型，會擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中表示的字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的物件至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式會使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，決定的大小時`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際的可變長度的字串，用於使用者定義資料類型搭配使用時所需的儲存體位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回的位元組數目的字串，而不是字元。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串為 Unicode，和`LenB`不受支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`變數做為參數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數為 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`不含任何其他類型，會擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用使用者定義型別和`Object`變數`Len`函式傳回的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。With user-defined types and `Object` variables, the `Len` function returns the size as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回字串的長度。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the string. 如果`Object`包含任何其他類型，它會傳回物件的大小，因為它會寫入至檔案`FilePut`函式。If an `Object` contains any other type, it will return the size of the object as it will be written to the file by the `FilePut` function. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中表示的字串，以位元組為單位的大小，寫入時的物件至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in objects to indicate the size of the string, in bytes, when written to disk. `Len`函式會使用`VBFixedString`屬性，如果有的話，決定的大小時`Object`變數。The `Len` function uses the `VBFixedString` attribute, if available, when determining the size of `Object` variables. > [!NOTE] > `Len`函式可能無法判斷實際的可變長度的字串，用於使用者定義資料類型搭配使用時所需的儲存體位元組數目。The `Len` function may not be able to determine the actual number of storage bytes required when used with variable-length strings in user-defined data types. > [!NOTE] > `LenB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回的位元組數目的字串，而不是字元。The `LenB` function in earlier versions of Visual Basic returns the number of bytes in a string rather than characters. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有目前的 Visual Basic 字串為 Unicode，和`LenB`不受支援。All current Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `LenB` is no longer supported. ## 智慧型裝置開發人員注意事項Smart Device Developer Notes `Len`函式只接受`String`和`Object`變數做為參數。The `Len` function accepts only `String` and `Object` variables as parameters. 如果`Object`包含`String`，它會傳回長度`String`。If an `Object` contains a `String`, it will return the length of the `String`. 如果參數為 NULL`Object`參考，此函數會傳回零。If a parameter is a NULL `Object` reference, the function returns zero. 如果`Object`不含任何其他類型，會擲回例外狀況。If an `Object` contains any other type, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個範例使用 `Len` 傳回字串中的字元數。This example uses `Len` to return the number of characters in a string. Visual Basic 也有`Mid`函式和`Mid`陳述式。Visual Basic has a `Mid` function and a `Mid` statement. 這些項目都會運作指定的字串中的字元數，但`Mid`函式會傳回的字元時`Mid`陳述式會取代字元。These elements both operate on a specified number of characters in a string, but the `Mid` function returns the characters while the `Mid` statement replaces the characters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Mid 陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/mid-statement.md)。For more information, see [Mid Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/mid-statement.md). > [!NOTE] > `MidB`在舊版的 Visual Basic 中的函式會傳回字串位元組，而不是字元。The `MidB` function in previous versions of Visual Basic returns a string in bytes rather than characters. 它是主要用於將雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 應用程式中的字串轉換。It is used primarily for converting strings in double-byte character set (DBCS) applications. 所有的 Visual Basic 字串為 Unicode，和`MidB`不受支援。All Visual Basic strings are in Unicode, and `MidB` is no longer supported. ## Examples 在此範例中的最後一行會使用此多載`Mid`函式傳回的第五個和後續字元字串。The last line in this example uses this overload of the `Mid` function to return the fifth and subsequent characters from a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，或當`Limit`等於-1，`Split`函式會在每次出現的分隔符號字串中，輸入的字串分割，並傳回陣列中的子字串。By default, or when `Limit` equals -1, the `Split` function splits the input string at every occurrence of the delimiter string, and returns the substrings in an array. 當`Limit`參數是小於或等於零，`Split`函式會分割此字串在第一個`Limit`-1 出現的分隔符號，並傳回產生的子字串的陣列。When the `Limit` parameter is greater than zero, the `Split` function splits the string at the first `Limit`-1 occurrences of the delimiter, and returns an array with the resulting substrings. 例如，`Split("a:b:c", ":")`會傳回陣列`{"a", "b", "c"}`，雖然`Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)`會傳回陣列`{"a", "b:c"}`。For example, `Split("a:b:c", ":")` returns the array `{"a", "b", "c"}`, while `Split("a:b:c", ":", 2)` returns the array `{"a", "b:c"}`. 當`Split`函式遇到在資料列中的兩個分隔符號或分隔符號的開頭或結尾的字串，它會將它們解譯為周圍的空字串 ("")。When the `Split` function encounters two delimiters in a row, or a delimiter at the beginning or end of the string, it interprets them as surrounding an empty string (""). 比方說，`Split("xx", "x")`會傳回包含三個空白的字串陣列： 一個介於開頭的字串和第一個"x"，其中這兩個"x"字串，頭尾包括在內，另一個介於最後一個"x"和字串的結尾。For example, `Split("xx", "x")` returns the array containing three empty strings: one from between the beginning of the string and the first "x", one from between the two "x" strings, and one from between the last "x" and the end of the string. 下表示範如何選擇性`Delimiter`， `Limit`，並`Compare`參數可變更的行為`Split`函式。This table demonstrates how the optional `Delimiter`, `Limit`, and `Compare` parameters can change the behavior of the `Split` function. |分割呼叫Split Call|傳回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Split("42, 12, 19")`|{"42," , "12," , "19"}{"42," , "12," , "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ")`|{"42", "12", "19"}{"42", "12", "19"}| |`Split("42, 12, 19", ", ", 2)`|{"42", "12, 19"}{"42", "12, 19"}| |`Split("192.168.0.1", ".")`|{"192", "168", "0", "1"}{"192", "168", "0", "1"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ")`|{"Alice 和 Bob"}{"Alice and Bob"}| |`Split("Alice and Bob", " AND ", ,CompareMethod.Text)`|{"Alice"，"Bob"}{"Alice", "Bob"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",1)`|{"someone@example.com"}{"someone@example.com"}| |`Split("someone@example.com", "@",2)`|{"someone"，"example.com"}{"someone", "example.com"}| `Compare`引數可以是下列值。The `Compare` argument can have the following values. |常數Constant|描述Description|值Value| |-|-|-| |`CompareMethod.Binary`|執行二進位比較Performs a binary comparison|00| |`CompareMethod.Text`|執行文字比較Performs a textual comparison|11| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在其空間將字串分隔。The following example demonstrates how to split a string at its spaces. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#13)] 下列範例示範如何分割資料列中的多個分隔符號的字串，並篩選出空的字串。The following example demonstrates how to split strings with multiple delimiters in a row and filter out the empty strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所開始的第一個字元的英數字元的排序鍵值比較的字串。The strings are compared by alphanumeric sort values beginning with the first character. 二進位比較、 文字的比較和排序次序的進一步資訊，請參閱[Option 比較陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md)。For further information on binary comparisons, textual comparisons, and sort order, see [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md). `Compare` 引數設定為︰The `Compare` argument settings are: |常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-| |`Binary`|執行二進位比較，而根據衍生自內部的二進位表示的字元的排序次序。Performs a binary comparison, based on a sort order derived from the internal binary representations of the characters.| |`Text`|執行文字比較，而根據取決於您的系統的不區分大小寫文字排序順序`LocaleID`值。Performs a text comparison, based on a case-insensitive text sort order determined by your system's `LocaleID` value.| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`StrComp`函式傳回的字串比較的結果。This example uses the `StrComp` function to return the results of a string comparison. remarks.format: ## Remarks 常數`VbStrConv.Wide`， `VbStrConv.Narrow`， `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`， `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`， `VbStrConv.Katakana`，和`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可能會導致執行階段錯誤時，它們不會套用，地區設定中使用但不是一定： 常數`VbStrConv.Katakana`並`VbStrConv.Hiragana`可以搭配非日文系統中安裝了日文語言套件。The constants `VbStrConv.Wide`, `VbStrConv.Narrow`, `VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese`, `VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese`, `VbStrConv.Katakana`, and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can cause run-time errors when used in locales where they do not apply, but not always: the constants `VbStrConv.Katakana` and `VbStrConv.Hiragana` can be used in a non-Japanese system with the Japanese Language Pack installed. 此外，使用的常數`VbStrConv.Wide`和`VbStrConv.Narrow`任何系統上安裝的東亞洲語言支援。In addition, use of the constants `VbStrConv.Wide` and `VbStrConv.Narrow` is supported on any system with an East Asian language installed. 管理字串，使大小寫變更所適用的地區設定中使用應用程式時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則作業應該使用方法，然後傳遞或是如`comparisonType`引數。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). `Conversion` 引數設定為︰The `Conversion` argument settings are: |列舉型別成員Enumeration member|描述Description| |-|-| |`VbStrConv.None`|會執行任何轉換Performs no conversion| |`VbStrConv.LinguisticCasing`|大小寫，而不是檔案系統 （預設值），會使用語言的規則。Uses linguistic rules for casing, rather than File System (default). 適用於`VbStrConv.UpperCase`和`VbStrConv.LowerCase`只。Valid with `VbStrConv.UpperCase` and `VbStrConv.LowerCase` only.| |`VbStrConv.UpperCase`|將字串轉換為大寫字元。Converts the string to uppercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.LowerCase`|將字串轉換為小寫字元。Converts the string to lowercase characters.| |`VbStrConv.ProperCase`|將轉換成大寫的字串中的每個字的第一個字母。Converts the first letter of every word in string to uppercase.| |`VbStrConv.Wide` \*`VbStrConv.Wide` \*|將窄 （半形） 字元 （全形） 的寬字元字串中。Converts narrow (half-width) characters in the string to wide (full-width) characters. [!INCLUDE[vbstrconv-wide](~/includes/vbstrconv-wide-md.md)]| |`VbStrConv.Narrow` \*`VbStrConv.Narrow` \*|將字串中要縮小 （半形） 字元的寬 （全形） 字元轉換。Converts wide (full-width) characters in the string to narrow (half-width) characters.| |`VbStrConv.Katakana` **`VbStrConv.Katakana` **|將字串中的平假名字元轉換為片假名字元。Converts Hiragana characters in the string to Katakana characters.| |`VbStrConv.Hiragana` **`VbStrConv.Hiragana` **|將字串中的片假名字元轉換為平假名字元。Converts Katakana characters in the string to Hiragana characters.| |`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` \*`VbStrConv.SimplifiedChinese` \*|將繁體中文字元轉換成簡體中文。Converts Traditional Chinese characters to Simplified Chinese.| |`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` \*`VbStrConv.TraditionalChinese` \*|將簡體中文字元轉換成繁體中文。Converts Simplified Chinese characters to Traditional Chinese.| \* 適用於亞洲地區設定。\* Applies to Asian locales. ** 僅適用於日本。** Applies to Japan only. > [!NOTE] > 這些常數會指定.NET Framework common language runtime 中。These constants are specified in the .NET Framework common language runtime. 如此一來，它們可以用於任何地方您的程式碼來取代實際的值。As a result, they can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. 大部分可以結合 (例如`UpperCase + Wide`)，除非它們是互斥 (比方說， `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`)。Most can be combined (for example, `UpperCase + Wide`), except when they are mutually exclusive (for example, `VbStrConv.Wide + VbStrConv.Narrow`). 以下是有效的文字分隔字元的適當大小寫： Null (`Chr$(0)`)，水平索引標籤 (`Chr$(9)`)，換行字元 (`Chr$(10)`)，垂直索引標籤 (`Chr$(11)`)、 換頁字元 (`Chr$(12)`)，歸位字元 (`Chr$(13)`)，空間 （單一位元組字元集） (`Chr$(32)`)。The following are valid word separators for proper casing: Null (`Chr$(0)`), horizontal tab (`Chr$(9)`), line feed (`Chr$(10)`), vertical tab (`Chr$(11)`), form feed (`Chr$(12)`), carriage return (`Chr$(13)`), space (single-byte character set) (`Chr$(32)`). 空間，這可以是完整或寬度的一半，實際的值會因國家/地區的東亞語言的文化特性而異。The actual value for a space, which can be full or half width, varies by country/region for East Asian cultures. ## Examples 此範例會將文字轉換成小寫字母。This example converts text into all lowercase letters. remarks.format: ## Remarks `LTrim`， `RTrim`，和`Trim`函式會移除字串的結尾中的空白。The `LTrim`, `RTrim`, and `Trim` functions remove spaces from the ends of strings. ## Examples 此範例使用 `LTrim` 函式刪除字串變數中的前置空格，並使用 `RTrim` 函式刪除字串變數中的尾端空格。This example uses the `LTrim` function to strip leading spaces and the `RTrim` function to strip trailing spaces from a string variable. 它會使用 `Trim` 函式刪除這兩種類型的空格。It uses the `Trim` function to strip both types of spaces. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能是小寫字母轉換成大寫;所有的大寫字母和 nonletter 字元保持不變。Only lowercase letters are converted to uppercase; all uppercase letters and nonletter characters remain unchanged. 管理字串，使大小寫變更所適用的地區設定中使用應用程式時，此函數會使用應用程式的文化特性資訊。This function uses the application's culture information when manipulating the string so that the case changes are appropriate for the locale in which the application is being used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您的應用程式進行比較或大小寫變更作業的結果為基礎的安全性決策，則作業應該使用方法，然後傳遞或是如`comparisonType`引數。If your application makes security decisions based on the result of a comparison or case-change operation, then the operation should use the method, and pass or for the `comparisonType` argument. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何文化特性會影響字串在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md)。For more information, see [How Culture Affects Strings in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/strings/how-culture-affects-strings.md). ## Examples 此範例使用 `UCase` 函式，傳回大寫字母版本的字串。This example uses the `UCase` function to return an uppercase version of a string. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#31)]
